import { React, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Form, Button, Row } from "react-bootstrap" const CreateUser = () => { const [newUser, setNewUser] = useState({ name: '', user: '', password: '' }) const saveNewUser = () => { if (!localStorage.getItem("listUsers")) { localStorage.setItem("listUsers", "[]") } let listUser = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("listUsers")) let insertUserArray = listUser.push(newUser) JSON.stringify(localStorage.setItem("listUsers",insertUserArray)) listUser = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("listUsers")) console.log(listUser) // let insertUser = JSON.stringify(JSON.parse().push(newUser)) // localStorage.setItem("listUsers", insertUser) // console.log(newUser) } return ( <>
ÁREA DE CADASTRO
Nome Completo: setNewUser({ ...newUser, name: a.target.value })} /> Usuário: setNewUser({ ...newUser, user: a.target.value })} /> Senha: setNewUser({ ...newUser, password: a.target.value })} />
) } export default CreateUser
